CustomField.description: This Product must either be included/excluded on a Quote with the Current Product and can be purchased by a customer only once or many times, depending on the other settings on this form.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This Product must either be included/excluded on a Quote with the Current Product and can be purchased by a customer only once or many times, depending on the other settings on this form.
CustomField.label: Related ZProduct
